096-163a shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad bsgrags/ /de bzhin bkra shis rgya cher gdon/ /'byor par 'gyur ba'i sil snyan dang / /glu dbyangs dag dang rnga sgra bsgrags/ /mdor na de la sogs pa yi/ /cho ga rgyas pa byas nas su/ /yid kyis dkyil 'khor lha kun la/ /mkhas pas gsol ba btab nas ni/ /bum pa bzlas brjod brgyar byas la/ /de ni legs par blangs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor dal bus lan gsum bskor/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kun 'don cing / /blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /gsang sngags blos ni spyi bos gtugs/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/ /blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur ro/ /slob ma yon tan kun ldan pa/ /nub phyogs kha bltas cho ga bya/ /byang phyogs kha bltas zhi ba'i phyir/ /rgyas pa'i cho ga shar du bltas/ /drag shul spyod pa de bzhin du/ /lho phyogs kha bltas brtson de bya/ /de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /de la sar pa'i gos rnams bskon/ /me tog dri la sogs pas mchod/ /mchod phyir thogs dang gdu bur bcas/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung / /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas pas sgo phyogs su/ /spyi bo btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug / gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin 'gyur ba'i/ /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag pas legs par blangs nas su/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams kyang ni kun gyis bkur/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar byos/ /

326
096-163b sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /de skad bsgo nas de 'og tu/ /de nas slob ma de yi phyir/ /sbyin sreg cho ga sngon bzhin bya/ /yam sreg shing gi me la ni/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ /mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya dag bya/ /de bzhin zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /zho dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba'i/ /til gyi sreg blugs brgya yang bya/ /sbyin sreg zin nas spyi bor ni/ /chu de nyid kyis bsang gtor bya/ /de nas de la dkyil 'khor ni/ /rab tu rgyas par bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po dag kyang bstan/ / rig sngags rgyal po klog tu gzhug /bla mas de la ci nus par/ /cho ga bzhin du zlos su gzhug /de nas slob ma blo ldan pas/ /me tog snyim pa bkang nas su/ /bdag gis sngags dang lha rnams kyang / /go rims bzhin du mchod byas nas/ /slob dpon sbyin sreg gnas 'dug la/ /dga' zhing gus pas dran byas la/ /de tshe bla ma ci 'dod pa'i/ /yon ni phyag rgyas dbul bar bya/ /bdag dang bdog pa kun bcas par/ /slob dpon la ni dbul bar bya/ /bdag nyid dbang ba'i skye bo kun/ /nor dang bcas shing rkang 'gros bcas/ /gzhan yang nor gyis mgu ba'am/ /yang na gang la dga' yang rung / /yang na bdag la ci 'dod pa/ /bla ma la ni de dbul lo/ /yang na dbul pos bla ma la/ /bkur sti dag gis mgu bar bya/ /slob dpon dag ni thams cad la/ /bkur sti bya ba yon du bshad/ /dang por ras zung gcig phul nas/ /phyi nas cho ga 'di kun bya/ /slob mas gsang sngags grub 'dod pas/ /bla ma mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /slob ma dam tshig bsrung ba yis/ /gos dang gser dang bdag nyid dang / /bu dang bdog pa thams cad ni/ /bla ma dag la yon du dbul/ /de nas bla mas slob ma rnams/ /ma yengs legs par bkod nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bklags te/ /dam tshig 'di la bsgo bar bya/ /de ring phyin chad khyed rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge

327
096-164a 'dun dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams la/ /dad pas rab tu brten par bya/ /rtag par phyag rgya chen po la/ /khyad par du ni mos par bya/ /dam tshig can dang mdza' bo dang / /bla ma la yang gus par bya/ /lha rnams kun la sdang mi bya/ /dus mtshams dag tu mchod par bya/ /ston pa gzhan gyi gzhung mi mchod/ /rtag tu glo bur 'gron mchod bya/ /srog chags rnams la byams pa'i sems/ /rab tu brtan pa nye bar gzhag /theg pa la ni dga' rnams kyi/ /bsod nams dag la nan tan bskyed/ /bzlas brjod byed la 'bad pa yis/ /gsang sngags spyod la brtson par bya/ /gsang sngags rgyud las bstan pa yi/ /dam tshig rnams kyang bsrung bar bya/ /dam tshig med pa rnams la ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi sbyin no/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni legs bsrung zhing / /de yang bdag gis rtogs par bya/ /de ltar dam tshig bsgo nas ni/ /nyid kyi phyag rgya rnams bstan la/ /nyid kyi rigs kyi rig pa sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang bshad par bya/ /de nas kha lag bkrus nas su/ /lha la mchod yon phul nas ni/ / go rims bzhin du thams cad la/ /bdug spos cho ga bzhin du dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rig sngags kyis/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul/ /zhi ba'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad/ /snying po yis ni nyi shu gcig /ji ltar bstan pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /mar gyis sbyin sreg so sor bya/ /de yi 'og tu rang sngags kyis/ /sbyin sreg ji ltar 'dod par bya/ /de nas phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin/ /bsdam zhing kha lag yang bkrus nas/ /me tog dri la sogs pa yis/ /slob mas ji ltar 'dod par mchod/ /slob ma dang bcas ma yengs par/ /mgo bos gus par phyag 'tshal te/ /snod du bshad pa gang yin pa/ /de nas spos chu phul nas su/ /so so'i sngags kyis ci rigs par/ /de nas slar ni gshegs su gsol/ /dman ma rnams ni phyags nas su/ /mtsho chen nang du dor bar bya/ /bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /

328
096-164b ci dgar phongs pa rnams la sbyin/ /khyi dang bya rog la sogs la/ /cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas su/ /bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad/ /de nas slob mas spyad na ni/ /da ma tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyod par mi 'dod na/ /de yi cho ga twa rim 'di'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul/ / gdugs dang rnga yab dril bu sogs/ /sangs rgyas nyid la dbul bar bya/ /gdan dang bdug spos dri la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad snod la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag la ni slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bkur ro/ /dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin/ /yang na dge slong ma la sbyin/ /gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na/ /dge bsnyen dag la sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yi phyi de nyin/ /nyes byas lhag ma zhi ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa yis ni zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyud kun las/ /dkyil 'khor ji ltar rgyas bshad pa'i/ /cho ga lhag ma lus pa dag /'dir ni lhag par rab tu bshad/ /slob dponagasang sngags rgyud la mkhas/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid tshul khrims ldan/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba la mkhas shing / /drang la gtsang sbra che ba shis/ /khang stong rdo thal gyis byugs pa/ /gtsang ma bzang po yangs pa dang / /lha khang du yang dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji skad bshad pa legs par bri/ /ji ltar chu na spyod pa yi/ /khang khyim byed pa de bzhin du/ /chu steng spang leb bzang po yis/ /bsdams pa dag tu bri bar bya/ /mchod sbyin sa dang grong gi sa/ /mi gtsang ba yis gang ba dang / /gzhan du dkyil 'khor du spyad pa'i/ /sa ni 'bad de spang bar bya/ /la la dkyil 'khor ba dag po ni/ /gcig pu kho nar las byar bsgrags/ /de nyid

329
096-165a kyis ni bya ba ste/ /sa 'og dkyil 'khor lta bu yin/ /kha cig tu ni 'khor tshogs kyis/ /las rnams bya bdag tu bshad/ /de yang de nyid kyis byas te/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yin/ /gang du las ni yod 'gyur la/ /rang gi las kyi cho ga med/ /der ni mkhas pas spyi rgyud las/ /gsungs pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dgodapa'i sngags/ /gang dag yongs su bsgrags pa ni/ /thog mar de dag re re la/ /bzlas brjod khri khri bya bar bshad/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gang bris pa/ /de dag rgyas par bzlas nas ni/ /dran par bya ba'i phyir yang ni/ /glegs bam der yang nye bar bzhag /khrus la sogs pa byed pa'i tshe/ /dkyil 'khor lta ba gzhan bzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i tshe na ni/ /nam yang stong par mi gzhag go/ /thig 'debs dus la bab pa'i tshe/ /slob ma gal te med na yang / /de ni phur bu cho ga yis/ /bdag rang nyid kyis thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi las dag la/ /gal te grogs shig med na yang / /der ni mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis/ /rnam pa de bzhin las bya'o/ /na dbu can dang tshul nyams dang / /gtsang sbra chung zhing ma bslabs pa/ /de lta bu dag rgyud mthong yang / /grogs su gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bder gshegs chos ni mi byed pa/ /la la rigs btsun dad cing drang / /dkyil 'khor thos na dad 'gyur te/ /gal te 'phral la 'ongs na ni/ /de yi dad pa brtan shes nas/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bris nas kyang / /bdag gis bstan la gzhug pa'i phyir/ /de ni gcig pu gzhug par bya/ /de yi sta gon gnas pa yang / /de dag nyid ni mod la bya/ / slob ma nang mi mthun pa dang / /cho ga'i tshul ni med pa la/ /ji skad bshad pa'i zhi ba bya/ /rgyal po'i mi ni dpa' snying can/ /lag na mtshon thogs pas bsrung zhing / /sa yi bdag pos gnang nas ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /slob ma yongs su gzung

330
096-165b ba gang / /sta gon gnas tshe med na ni/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams bya/ /slob ma yongs su gzung ba gang / /gal te rkyen 'ga' zhig gis ni/ /der ni 'ongs par ma gyur na/ /gzhan dag de yi skyin par gzhug / sta gon gnas par byas pa las/ /gal te rkyen gyis ma 'ongs na/ /bla ma blo ldan mkhas pa yis/ /der ni slob ma gzhan mi gzung / /sta gon gnas par byas pa las/ /bla ma gal te dkyil 'khor du/ /gang zhig 'ongs par ma gyur na/ /nad kyis btab nas nges par 'chi/ /rkyen 'ga' zhig gis bskal nas su/ /gal te nyin gcig bar chad na/ /de yi nyin par zhi byas nas/ /slar yang sta gon gnas par bya/ /yo byad gces pa ma 'byor yang / /bshol ba dag ni yong mi bya/ /gal te bshol na bla ma la/ /gnod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i tshe na ni/ /gnod pa 'ga' zhig 'byung 'gyur na/ /bshad pa'i sngags kyi stobs kyis su/ /de ni slar yang bzlog par bya/ /des kyang bzlog par ma nus na/ /mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni/ /bsang gtor byas te phul nas su/ /mchod yon phul te slar gshegs gsol/ /blo dang ldan pas phyi de nyin/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bri/ /yang na mkhas pas sbyin sreg gi/ /las kyis zhi bar rab tu bya/ /ma bdun gyi ni dkyil 'khor dang / /gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor bshad pa gang / /de la sogs pa dgod pa ni/ /nyes pa rim bzhin brtag mi dgos/ /de dag tu ni de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor dgod pa rgyas par bya/ /cho gar byas pa gzhan dag las/ /cho ga 'di ni ci rigs sbyar/ /mdor bsdus bshad pa gang yin dang / /rgyas par bshad pa gang yin dang / /zur gyis bstan dang mdo las ni/ /spyir bstan pa ni gang yin pa/ /de rnams bya ba'i cho ga la/ /rgyud 'dir rgyas par bshad pa yin/ /mkhas pas cho ga 'di yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen

331
096-166a po'i mdo las ni/ /ci bshad cho ga rgyas par bya/ /bla mas ji skad bstan pa dang / /rtog pa dag las ci gsungs dang / /gsang sngags kun gyi 'dul ba las/ /cho ga rim pa ci bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga la/ /mkhas pas cho ga de bzhin sbyar/ /gsang sngags kyi ni tshad dag las/ /bum pa la sogs bstan byas pa/ /der yang cho ga 'di yis ni/ /lhag par byas la nyes pa med/ /de bzhin gsang sngags cho ga la/ /lha gzhan gyi ni gtor ma yang / /dkyil 'khor dag tu bshad pa las/ /lhag par byas kyang nyes pa med/ /de bas gang du cung zad cig /bklags te bshad pa gang yin pa/ /der ni dogs pa med sems kyis/ /thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya/ /la lar slob ma dang bcas te/ /bdug spos dang ni mar me dag /lag tu thogs te mnyam par ni/ /dkyil 'khor bskor bar ba shad pa dang / /da ma tshig ston tshe slob ma rnams/ /las kyi grwar ni zhugs nas su/ /me tog 'dor bar bya'o zhes/ /khyad par bshad pa gang yin dang / /de la sogs pa'i cho ga dag /gang du cung zad bshad pa ni/ /der ni dga' mgu nyid du bya'i/ /kun la de kun sbyar mi bya/ /lha yi rigs rnams mthong ba las/ /dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi/ /bla ma mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /de dag shes nas ci rigs bya/ /slob dpon go 'phang thob pa'i phyir/ /dang po yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /rig sngags rnams ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /gnyis pa legs par bshad pa yin/ /bgegs rnams rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ /gsum pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /bzhi pa 'byor pa thob pa'i phyir/ / cho ga rgyas pa de bshad do/ /dang po cho ga rgyas par ni/ /nga yis thog mar bshad pa yin/ /rigs gsum dbang bskur cho ga yang / /mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir bshad do/ /slob ma lha yi rigs mthong ba/ /rig sngags gang la zlos 'dod pa/ /de yis brgya rtsa brgyad

332
096-166b bzlas pa'i/ /bum pas mngon par dbang bskur bya/ /de nyid kyis kyang sbyin sreg bya/ /de nyid du ni de yang bzlas/ /de ltar gang zhig dbang bskur ba/ /dbang bskur cho ga gnyis pa yin/ /sems ni bgegs kyis brlams pa dag /zhi bar bya ba gang yin pa/ /de ni dbang bskur gsum pa ste/ /phan dang bde ba thob par bshad/ /dpal la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyal srid thob phyir dbang bskur dang / /byur ni med par bya ba dang / /dpal yang bskyed par bya ba dang / /nor dang bu tsha 'phan pa dang / /de la sogs pa dbang bskur gang / /de ni bzhi pa'i mi rnams la/ /'byor pa sbyin par shes par bya/ /dbang bskur dang po thob pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgongs par 'gyur/ /de'i sras gsang sngags spyod pa la/ /brtson pa rnams kyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /rig sngags gsang sngags mang po dang / /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / /dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin pa dag /nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /de yis sbyar na sgrub pa po/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ni cis kyang mi tshugs shing / /lha rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'gyur/ /'khor ba na ni 'khor ba na/ /de ni ngan song ltung mi 'gyur/ /yan lag nyams dang dbul ba dang / /smad pa rnams su skye mi 'gyur/ /tshe rabs dran zhing longs spyod che/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing gzugs kyang bzang / /rtag tu lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /mtho ris rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub las mi ldog /des ni ring po mi thogs par/ /byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan ni/ /mang po rgya chen dag dang ldan/ /rig sngags rnams kyi rigs skye zhing / /de ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /de ltar mngon par dbang bskur zhing / /blo ldan rgyud ni mthong ba la/ /bla ma las ni lung thob pas/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar bya/ /

333
096-167a yon tan 'di dang mi ldan par/ /gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'dri byed pa/ /de ni mi bzad sems dmyal ltung / /slob ma rnams kyang don med 'gyur/ /mu ge dang ni nad mang dang / /than pa dang ni 'tshe ba 'byung / /rgyal po rnams kyang 'thab pa dang / / chom rkun la sogs 'jigs pa 'byung / /de dang de yi rgyu rnams kyis/ /slob ma rnams kyang phung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga mi ldan par/ bris na bla ma nges par 'chi/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs dkyil 'khor du/ /gang zhig legs par dbang bskur ba/ /de ni rigs rnams gsum char gyi/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs slob dpon 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ba/ /de ni rigs gnyis dkyil 'khor gyi/ /slob dpon du ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ / phyag na rdo rje gzi chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ba/ /de ni rdo rje rigs gcig gi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon 'gyur/ /ma mo gnod sbyin drag po yi/ /dkyil 'khor gang dag ci bshad pa/ /thams cad de dag kun gyis kyang / /dogs pa med par bri bar bya/ /bla mas slob ma gcig pu ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu dbang bskur bya/ /mkhas pas cig char slob ma gnyis/ /dbang bskur ba ni yong mi bya/ /gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi yang rung / /bla mas dbang bskur bya ba ni/ /yo byad sar pa gzhan rnams kyis/ /thams cad so so so sor bya/ /rig sngags dbang ni thob pa la/ /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga dang / /bsgrub pa'i cho ga'ang de bzhin sbyin/ /slob ma dam tshig shes pa ni/ /gzhan rnams la ni rang gi sngags/ /cho gar bcas shing phyag rgyar bcas/ /cho ga rgyas dang bcas par sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor legs par ma mthong bar/ /gang zhig ji ste sngags zlos na/ /des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /shi na ngan song ltung bar 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga dag /gang zhig de la ston pa yang / /de ni dam tshig nyams

334
096-167b gyur nas/ /ngu 'bod sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams/ /gal te nyams par gang gyur pa/ /des ni rang gi snying po'i sngags/ /gcig 'bum du ni bzlas brjod bya/ /yang na mes rmongs byed pa'i gzungs/ /stong du bzlas brjod byas kyang rung / /yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na dkyil 'khor du yang 'jug /gti mug dbang gis mi shes par/ /mi gang dkyil 'khor 'dri byed pa/ /de ni mtshams med lnga rnams dang / /'dra ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig bsod nams las byed pa/ /cho ga legs par 'dri na ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen te/ /'dod pa'i gnas ni dam par skye/ /gshed byed rnams dang ro langs dang / /sha za lto 'phye chen po dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gdon rnams dang / /'jigs par 'gyur ba'i bgegs rnams kyis/ /lha yi rigs mthong dam tshig shes/ / rtag tu tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi mi dge'i las 'byang zhing / /ngan song du yang yong mi ltung / /de yis bsgrubs na nges par ni/ /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la byang chub sa bon ni/ /brtan par 'gyur bar dogs pa med/ /slob dpon blo gros chen po yis/ / gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin pa po/ /slob ma bsdams pa snying rje can/ /gcig ni nan tan bskyed de bsgrub/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /cho ga 'di ni dam pa ste/ /blo dang ldan pas cho ga 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni bri bar bya/ /rig sngags rgyal dang phyag rgya che/ / dkyil 'khor rnams ni thams cad kyang / /slob ma la ni sngags byin nas/ /de nas bla mas rgyud 'di byin/ /dbang gi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol/ /bsgrub pa chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi bzhed lugs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mdzad byang ma lus par yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin no// //dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa rim par phye ba/ phyag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyis bstan pa las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba spyi'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //
